title: does riot have a fetish for adc's or something?

embed.description: Post with 3 views. Shared by NikolayStefanov. I hate you rito game

body:
can we please get an actual nerf on this {{item:3504}} (this broken as fuck item broke the game)
I see that they nerfed the item late game but the reason why people(also me) on reddit and boards were complaining(they still complain) was because the item gave them too big mid game powerspike(they actualy buffed that.LOL) and allowed them to build 4 items without lifesteal and still draintank everything like they had a bloodthirster
the adc"s already have disgusting late game so a small nerf wont do anything to stop them from 2v5 the enemy team with a janna,lulu or soraka
it looks like riot want the adc to be the main protagonist of league of legends and everyone else to be a secondary suport(execept the actual suport) and it feels like being an npc of an open world game
everysingle lane right now has the job of protecting the adc leting him/her carry them to victory(I puked aften I wrote this)
every toplaner buys this:{{item:3109}} {{item:3193}} {{item:3190}} 
every jungler buys this:{{item:1413}} {{item:3109}} {{item:3193}} {{item:3190}} (variety)
mid is a mess right now with all the adc,assasinss and tanks running around but mages are played only because of their utility{{champion:163}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:134}} (she has been meta for a year now)
EVERY suport that cant abuse{{item:3504}} is garbage(I play them)
if the enemy team has{{champion:18}} {{champion:40}} bot lane the only way I can win as nasus is if I completely ignore my team and open D gates(backdoor)

replies.body:
yes they do
they trully do

the lack of coin nerf, and joke nerf of ardent is the best indicator of it

someone just went through this patch and was like "coin is not busted at all, despite being the first item bought 100% on all supports"
supports will still be able to buy ardent by 8 min now, and their baby adcs will remain the overlords  dictating the game
an adc and a support are 2 playeres which is 40% of the team.

Well yeah, but here you can apply 'the whole is stronger than the sum of it's parts'.

The itemizations synergise too well and make them into 60% of the team.

I'd personally just like to see all of the healing/shield-buffing items get the whole "redemption" thing where they are relatively weak by themselves but together become something pretty obnoxious. Not only would it enable more diverse support options botlane (healers/shielders being the equivalent of late-game scaling mages who need to snowball to be relevant midgame), but it'd also prevent stupid things like ardent censer lee sin that have been appearing in this meta.
A bunch of support don't buy coin.
Yes, all the unviable ones.
I disagree.

adc dictates balance. adc was the reason most assassins got ruined. adcs are the reason any champ u enjoy will soon get gutted while they kill u with shiv and red buff in 3 autos because there is clear counterplay to an adc right clicking you to death /s . 

Inb4 adc mains say buy armor when I can just say they should have bought armor/mr vs assassins/mages. 

I'm just playing other games like PUBG / Persona 5 and  the odd urf with friends until they rework LB properly and fix the broken adc role.
our adc is the main hero of league of legends and the enemy adc is the villian and mark merrill shall punish those who say otherwise
I realized this ages ago and kept calling them out for it. It's only recently as it's gotten worse people have noticed.
Actually people get to diamond because of their game knowledge.  Pure mechanics can only get you as far as silver/gold.  My friend can confirmed this

Nope.

Riven is a great counter example, and of course Graves was one too.

I don't think you understand that the censor nerf is actually pretty solid as it is quite a bit less healing on autos and less attack speed also means less healing. 

Censor is a decrease in effectiveness after something like level 5 or 6. That is not a buff to its mid game.

they dercreased the on hit damage and the attack speed at lv 8 by 1(it it that BIG of a nerf)
it is a buff if the suport manages the rush it earlier
Right now that nerfed ardent censer back to before heal Shields rework.  The only difference now is 10%heal Shields power.  I'm good with lowering the base heal to compensate.  Maybe to 20.
The breakeven point is at level 6. So it is only a buff before then. And few supports can get Ardent by level 6.

I dont know a single support that would RUSH ardent censer and even then its not a problem in laning phase its a problem late game. Item should be removed IMO but this is a nerf in any way you look at it.

ADC is a very strong ATM, but can we be honest with each other and call a good nerf and good nerf. Like that is a big hit to the scaling of the item. Not sure why the early game was made stronger. It's still a strong hit to the item overall though.
It wasn't made stronger early game. The breakeven point is level 6, and I don't see anyone getting Censer before 6...
I dont want to be that guy but, at lv 6 it was 24.41 for the attack speed and drain and at lv 7 it was 25.29
